name: Us (Tung Phan)
description:
"No matter how far you travel, you can never get away from yourself. It’s like your shadow. It follows you everywhere" -Haruki Murakami, After the Quake Throw hearts, spread loves. Go through a short journey to discover people's thoughts and anxieties throughout their life.

You are an important piece of the universe, you will listen and understand the thoughts of the people of StrawberryVille and you will give them what they need the most.

Be sure to try out hard mode too!

WASD to move Right Click to listen to thoughts Left Click to throw hearts Music:  _Tea for Two _Demilitarized zone  All of those twos are from Youtube free music library
